sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { InfiniteScrollModule } from 'ngx-infinite-scroll/public-api'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { images = [ { url: './../../assets/images/carousel_slide1.jpg' }, { url: './../../assets/images/carousel_slide2.jpg' }, { url: './../../assets/images/carousel_slide3.jpg' }, ]; onScroll(){ console.log('Scrolled!'); } }
